British International School Kuala Lumpur Part of The British Schools Foundation
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
I trust this finds you all well.
We are happy to announce that as of Monday 25th February 2013 we will be selling professional photographs taken at a selection of school events.
These photographs will be available on CDs which you can purchase from the school reception at RM5 each. Including a selection of future events, the following past events will be available:
End of year Primary Production – Ocean Commotion 26th June 2012
End of year Middle School Production – Bugsy Malone 4th July 2012
Deepavali Assembly 26th November 2012
International Day 24th October 2012
Primary Christmas Production – A Christmas Recipe – 12th December 2012
Primary Christmas Production – A Christmas Recipe – 13th December 2012
Middle School Christmas Carols & Christmas Bazaar – 10th December 2012
Chinese New Year Assembly – 8th February 2013
If you wish to purchase a CD please place your order form along with payment at the school reception. Your CD will then be ready for collection from the reception one week upon ordering.
If you have any further questions please do not hesitate to contact a member of our Administration Team.
Regards, Administration Team The British International School of Kuala Lumpur World Class Education
